snippet: The Green Book, which generations of lobbyists, journalists and others have used to find out who does what in New York City, has been converted to an online directory.
abstract: Bloomberg administration plans to unveil online version of the Green Book, New York City's official government directory.
lead_paragraph: The Green Book, which generations of lobbyists, journalists and others have used to find out who does what in New York City, has been converted to an online directory.

headline.seo: New York City’s Green Book Becomes Online Directory
headline.main: After Decades, Directory Shifts to the Web
headline.print_headline: After Decades, City's Government Directory Shifts Online
